channel.title: Wilderness help
channel.description: Hey, guys I want to make a place wildy or non wildy I just want to know what to do with the coords I don't get that. :S

item.title: Wilderness help
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

You have to use the coordinates to create a boxed area by getting the south-west and north-east, then using > and < to set it.

For example;

if (absX < 3252 && absX > 3248 //If the players X coordinate is lower than 3252, but higher than 3248. && absY < 3396 && absY > 3391) { //If the players Y coordinate is lower than 3396, but higher than 3391. }

That’ll create a small box near Aubury’s rune shop. I’m sorry, but I really can’t explain it any better, imo it’s one of those things you have to work out yourself.

If anyone can expand on that, feel free.

Read full topic
